				radial4.blinkUserLed(msg.payload.pump);Â 
				radial4.setUserLedOnOff(msg.payload.pump);Â 
			}
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  if (typeof(msg.payload.fire) != "undefined") {

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  if (msg.payload.trend==0)Â Â Â Â  radial4.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.STEADY);

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  });
Â Â Â  })(scope);

Â Â Â  var sections = [steelseries.Section(20, 50, 'rgba(0, 0, 220, 0.3)'),

name: Sparge Temp Gauge
format:
<script src="/myjs/myGauge-min.js"></script>
<script>
var radialSparge;
    (function(scope){
        scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
            if (typeof(msg.payload.desc) != "undefined") radialSparge.setUnitString(msg.payload.desc);
            if (typeof(msg.payload.tempActual) != "undefined") radialSparge.setValue(msg.payload.tempActual);
            if (typeof(msg.payload.tempTarget) != "undefined") radialSparge.setThreshold(msg.payload.tempTarget);
            if (typeof(msg.payload.boilValve) != "undefined") {
//				radialSparge.blinkUserLed(msg.payload.boilValve);
				radialSparge.setUserLedOnOff(msg.payload.boilValve);
			}
            if (typeof(msg.payload.fire) != "undefined") {
				radialSparge.blinkLed(msg.payload.fire);
				radialSparge.setLedOnOff(msg.payload.fire);
			}
            if (typeof(msg.payload.trend) != "undefined")
            {
                if (msg.payload.trend==1)Â Â Â Â  radialSparge.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.UP);
                if (msg.payload.trend==0)Â Â Â Â  radialSparge.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.STEADY);
                if (msg.payload.trend==-1)Â Â Â  radialSparge.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.DOWN);
                if (msg.payload.trend==-2)Â Â Â  radialSparge.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.OFF);
            }
        });
    })(scope);

Â Â Â  var sections = [steelseries.Section(20, 76, 'rgba(0, 0, 220, 0.3)'),
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  steelseries.Section(76, 80, 'rgba(0, 220, 0, 0.3)'),
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  steelseries.Section(80, 90, 'rgba(220, 0, 0, 0.3)') ],

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  // Define one area
Â Â Â  areas = [steelseries.Section(76, 80, 'rgba(0, 220, 0, 0.3)')],

Â Â Â  radialSparge = new steelseries.Radial('canvasRadialSparge', {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  gaugeType: steelseries.GaugeType.TYPE4,
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  size: 292,
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  section: sections,
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  area: areas,
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  titleString: "Sparge",
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  unitString: "",
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  threshold: 0,
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  thresholdRising: false,
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  userLedVisible: true,
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  useOdometer: false,
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  lcdVisible: false,
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  trendVisible: true,
//			userLedColor: steelseries.LedColor.BLUE_LED,
			PointerType: steelseries.PointerType.TYPE11,
			FrameDesign: steelseries.FrameDesign.BLACK_METAL,
			frameVisible: false,
			minValue : 20,
			maxValue : 90
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  });
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â 
//Â Â Â  radial4.setFrameDesign(steelseries.FrameDesign.BLACK_METAL);
Â Â Â  radialSparge.setValue(0);
Â Â Â  radialSparge.setThreshold(0);
Â Â Â  radialSparge.blinkUserLed(0);
//	radial4.setPointerType(steelseries.PointerType.TYPE11)


</script>

<canvas id="canvasRadialSparge" width="401" height="401"></canvas>

Â Â Â  var sections = [steelseries.Section(90, 99, 'rgba(0, 0, 220, 0.3)'),

	Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  steelseries.Section(101, 104, 'rgba(220, 0, 0, 0.3)') ],

Â Â Â  radialBoil = new steelseries.Radial('canvasRadialBoil', {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  gaugeType: steelseries.GaugeType.TYPE4,
